content: together knit knit k tbl knit through the back loop purl purl ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sts back on the left needle and k2tog through the back loop pm place marker bor beginning of round sm slip marker repeat sts between brackets the indicated number of times sl1 slip 1 st purlwise with yarn at back yo bring the yarn forward and then over the right hand needle to create a stitch mc main colour yarn used for the body of the sock cc contrast colour yarn used for the rib eyelet pattern chart the eyelet pattern chart is worked across the first 28 32 36 sts of the sock repeat the sts in the red box the indicated number of times for your size 4 cherry pie socks by debbie ford eyelet pattern written instructions row 1 2 and 3 knit 28 32 36 sts row 4 k1 k2tog yo k2 k2tog yo × 5 6 7 k5 row 5 6 and 7 knit row 8 k3 k1 yo ssk k1 x 5 6 7 k1 yo ssk k2 i love seeing what you make tag your photos with @daisystitches and use the hashtags #cherrypiesocks and #debbieforddesigns this pattern has been tested and tech edited for pattern support you can email me at de88ieford@yahoo co uk 5 cherry pie socks by debbie ford
